mission.posting: Scan the official PS4 Website to get the latest reports into Shield Hub

email.subject: PS4 Scan
email.body:
Hey #PLAYERNAME#. I'm Brian. You will use nmap. Scan the official ps4 website and send the output to the discord: tanjil#1010
The discord user will open the ports of ps4 and sent you the hidden ps4 ip address to delete the database.
Thanks,
- Brian
